mapper.sql: sid, entryid, amount, Projecttype, Additional, `date`, Agentid, branchid, accountid, cost, income, `operator`, remarks
mapper.select: SELECT ag.`agent_name`,br.`branchname`,us.`user_name`,co.`typeName`,e.`date`,e.`remarks`,e.`amount` FROM expenseincome e LEFT JOIN `agent` ag ON e.`Agentid` = ag.`agent_id` LEFT JOIN `branch` br ON e.`branchid` = br.`branchid` LEFT JOIN `sys_user` us ON e.`operatorid` = us.`user_id` LEFT JOIN `cost` co ON e.`entryid` = co.`fid` WHERE co.`typeName` = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT co.`typeName`,co.`Additional`,co.`Projecttype`,e.`income` FROM expenseincome e LEFT JOIN `cost` co ON e.`entryid` = co.`fid`
mapper.insert:
insert into expenseincome
entryid,
amount,
Projecttype,
Additional,
`date`,
Agentid,
branchid,
accountid,
cost,
income,
`operator`,
remarks,

mapper.update:
update expenseincome
entryid = #{entryid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Projecttype = #{projecttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Additional = #{additional,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`date` = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Agentid = #{agentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
branchid = #{branchid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
accountid = #{accountid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
income = #{income,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
`operator` = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update expenseincome set entryid = #{entryid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Projecttype = #{projecttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Additional = #{additional,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `date` = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Agentid = #{agentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, branchid = #{branchid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, accountid = #{accountid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, income = #{income,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, `operator` = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
